sub_title: Project leader Advanced Software at Fontys University of Applied Sciences
summary:
My colleagues describe me as a wild and philosophical intellect.They value me the most for my unlimited supply of innovative ideas and an eclectic approach to solving difficult problems.I offer them a vision and clarification when things get complex.

During past years I have performed a wide range of software engineering tasks, experienced different working environments and cultures that lead me to an open-minded and flexible attitude. I have a deep understanding of fundamental concepts in technology and science which enables me to be productive in any project, pick up new technology fast and keep innovating.

My biggest interests are in applied research in sectors that have a broad impact on humanity.  I am driven by a constant search for an improvement, both in professional and in free time. This drives me to keep on learning and use cross domain approaches to deliver stunning results.

Very fast learner, able to perform from day 1

Very creative and innovative with research capabilities

Inner drive for learning and use of gained knowledge in novel contexts.

Very good in abstract problem formulation, analysis and solving.

Very good in integrating seemingly non related pieces of knowledge into a stunning solution.

Social and with mediation skills (based on a critical and objective insight).

Quality oriented and getting satisfaction from measurable results.

Interests: inventing, human aspects of technology, optimization, automation, AI, robotics, physics, mathematics, cryptology, futurology, reading, thinking, blues, about anything that can get me inspired or i can learn from

Specialties: R&D software engineering, SW craftsmanship, AI, ML, solving complex problems, heuristics, applied research, C#, .Net, Java, Prolog, genetic programming, optimization, agile (Scrum, Kanban)

education.degree_name: curses from (advanced) Master in Industrial Management

profile_positions.description: Matching digitalization and AI challenges of middle and small companies with the students who help to solve them. Coordinating this match making over multiple (applied) universities and colleges.
profile_positions.title: Case Manager Digital workspaces

profile_positions.description:
Participating in various applied research projects combining AI an SW engineering in practical situations. Mainly a SW architect role, working on a reference architectures for various research projects.

Mentoring and coaching students in software engineering subjects. 

Creating course material and teaching courses on:

Big Data (noSQL databases, architecture, stream and batch processing, messaging systems), applied data science (data visualisation with Tableau, data wrangling/cleaning/scraping, NLP), cloud solutions (Google,Aws,Azure),
 DevSecOps, infra as code, automated (UI) testing, virtualization, 
web services, microservices, distributed systems integration and architecture, JPA, scalable architectures, 
algorithms and data structures design, quantum computing
blockchain and smart contracts

tech:
Hadoop, Spark, Hive, MongoDB, BigTable, Tableau, Kafka, RabbitMQ, Akka Streams, JMS, JPA, Java EE, Docker, Kubernetes, Arifactory, SonarQube, Gradle, Maven, Jenkins, IntelliJ, Netbeans, Visual Studio, Git, Java mission control, Intel VTune Amplifier

languages:
Java, .NET C#, Python, Prolog, SQL, BigQuery
profile_positions.title: Applied Researcher and Lecturer

profile_positions.description: In a team we optimize our institution to maximize self development and use of individuals' strengths. We are facilitating a company culture change towards a self-learning network organization. A higher goal is to reach a culture of a self development within dynamic network of professionals inside and outside our organization. It is a way to transform Fontys ICT to an innovative center of high expertise and decentralize strategic decision making.
profile_positions.title: Project leader strenghts based development

profile_positions.description: Help to define our strategy and roll out of actions to create sustained impact on society. Focusing on culture change within Fontys by introducing and promoting inclusivity and diversity through daily work of our colleagues and students.
profile_positions.title: Key figure Inclusivity and Diversity

profile_positions.description: Via consortium co-defining project direction, validation and implementation. Managing research team at Fontys ICT. Fontys ICT takes a role in both technical and end user validation of virtual, human-like, avatars via automated pipeline and experiments.
profile_positions.title: Research project leader Virtual Humans in the Brabant Economy

profile_positions.description: Fontys ICT initiated a research on multisensory emotion detection within video calls between a patient and a psychologist. This is a pilot program to assess viability of video call enhancement with a real time dashboard presenting emotions of the caller. Social professional is assessing the usability of such system.
profile_positions.title: R&D Project Manager Emoticall

profile_positions.description:
Company researching and developing novel algorithms to solve the most complex computational problems. Focus on optimality and performance.

Extreme software optimization on algorithm design and implementation level (Java JVM tweaking, C# .Net tuning, parallelization) as well as full use of HW capabilities (Intel CPU architecture, memory bandwidth, cache, code vectorization).
Design of HPC solutions (Fortran) and scalable SW architectures
We also use quantum/hybrid  and other non-conventional SW/HW approaches if necessary.
Investigating overlooked trends using cybernetical vectors, black swan event predictions. 
Writing whitepapers on future technologies and their applicability to todays problems.
Debunking tech fashion and refurbished old tech.
Giving inspirational talks on quantum computing and other forms of analog computing.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
R&D project for optimization of pallet loading (Java, C#, R, machine learning, genetic algorithm).

Client requires a high performance robotic system for stacking various products onto different sized pallets. Stability, utilization and short lead times are main constraints. Within a team of professionals we are researching and applying various algorithms to tackle this problem.

My contributions are:
-helping to deliver KPI's that were considered impossible
-vision on a fast paced, sustained improvement
-out of the box, creative ideas
-significant memory and CPU performance improvements
-design of well defined heuristics to guide the optimization process
-implementation of new features
-helping others when they are getting stuck
-sparring partner for ideas
profile_positions.title: R&D Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Supply top management with the strategic vision on trends in technology. 
Creating technology road maps and detailed plans for delivery management. 
Planning of technology development that is used as reusable building blocks for all projects. 
Inspiring organisation with innovation spirit, planning required inhouse expertise development.
Specialized in envisioning impacts of AI, Big Data, DSL, Domain Reasoning and unconventional computing in various domains.
profile_positions.title: Technology board member

profile_positions.description: As the founding father of the innovation lab idea I work with a motivated team to organize and execute tasks related to creation and sustainability of our innovation lab. It is a platform for innovation creation, knowledge sharing and informal contact among Altran employees.
profile_positions.title: Altran Innovation Lab board member

profile_positions.description:
Mentoring handful of students throughout their graduation projects at Altran. Additionally, design of suitable industrial graduation projects.

I really believe that a good help early on in ones professional life can make a huge difference in either forming a fulfilling software craftsmanship experience or a troubled engineer. Supporting students and guiding their choices in a respectfull manner is a trust based relationship.
profile_positions.title: Technical Mentor

profile_positions.description:
In a short time frame client required to create a complete test suite and trace all test results for a healthcare device. 

I achieved that by using fully automated behavior driven test suite (C#) that runs whole test suite and outputs generated test report document at each SW release. Used computer vision to automatically analyse an external interface of the device.

This allowed to further reduce budget requirements on this constrained project since test were running without me being at client location.

Additionally, I have coached the team on the use of SCRUM to manage tasks more efficiently and on use of SVN for reliable versioning of their software.

Verify and validate system requirements of a healthcare product.
Create a test plan, test strategy and execute tests on a device.
Build test HW and SW setup.
Use BDD and extensive test automation on system level- including computer vision to monitor external interface of the device.
profile_positions.title: R&D Senior Test Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Engineering software for various clients and inhouse projects. Java, C#, Android, Jenkins, Continuous Integration.

Scrum master role for a team of 11 software engineers on 2 locations.
profile_positions.title: Technical Systems Designer

profile_positions.description: R&D Optimizer Team researches and improves genetic algorithms to find an optimal settings for pick and place machines. By optimization of production settings, machines are able to better utilize their capabilities, deliver better throughput, execute more flexible production schemes and by doing so deliver more value to the clients.
profile_positions.title: R&D Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Test department was struggling with coordination of test activities across multi-site facilities. FDA requires full traceability of test activities and documents. This could not be ensured by current processes. Misinformation, long delays, lack of coordination and interruptions by external stakeholders made it difficult for the teams to perform their tasks. Client wanted to develop system to support his team. I have shown him a much cheaper and complete solution to the problem.

I have pointed him towards ongoing efforts within his own organisation to create what he basically needed. In the end all that had to be done was to hold a meeting of key stakeholders within the organisation to make them aware of the arising synergy opportunity.

I have elicited system requirements and proposed the architecture for an information management system using existing subsystems already known to the organisation. It saved the client the time and serious costs by convincing him not to develop a new system from the scratch. 

Additionally, from the experience within other organisations, I did advise on process improvements by utilization of Agile methodology to greatly improve internal communications of the teams and coordination of their work.
profile_positions.title: Requirements Engineer
